cause.description:
CODEPINK is a women-initiated grassroots peace and social justice movement working to end the wars in Afghanistan and Iraq, stop new wars, and redirect our resources into healthcare, education and other life-affirming activities. We reject fear-based politics that justify violence, and instead call for policies based on compassion, kindness and a commitment to international law. With an emphasis on joy and humor, CODEPINK women and men seek to activate, amplify and inspire a community of peacemakers through creative campaigns and a commitment to non-violence.
1. End the wars in Afghanistan and Iraq, and the drone attacks
2. Stop new wars
3. Stand up for human rights
4. Non-violence
5. Redirect our resources into healthcare, education, and green jobs
cause.mission: CODEPINK is a women-initiated grassroots peace and social justice movement working to end the wars and redirect our resources into green jobs, healthcare, and education.
cause.name: CODEPINK: Women for Peace
